frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-espresso
frozen.shortDescription: Set conditions to disable the screensaver and auto suspend. Espresso is a fork of the Caffeine extension, and Espresso only supports Gnome 40 and Gnome 41. Please leave feedback or report issues through the Extension Homepage
frozen.longDescription: Set conditions to disable the screensaver and auto suspend. Espresso is a fork of the Caffeine extension, and Espresso only supports Gnome 40 and Gnome 41. Please leave feedback or report issues through the Extension Homepage
